sorcer.core.provider

Interface Provider

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Administrable, Monitorable, Remote, Service
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    SorcerNotifierProtocol
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AccountProvider, ExertMonitor, ServiceCataloger, ServiceProvider, ServiceTasker, StaticServiceProvider

    public interface Provider
extends Service, Monitorable, Administrable, Remote
    This is an interface that defines how a provider interacts with other code the through the methods that are exposed. It extends Service, Monitorable, and Remote.
    See Also:
    Service, Monitorable, Remote
